Author: mynameishere
Content:
Yeah, but there's _two_:

http://www.socializr.com/\nhttp://www.socializer.com/

So now they have an evil triplet. He should call it MySocializr.com

Author: jamongkad
Content: I think the point the author is making is to build something useful for users. I totally agree with him on this!. His blog hits us with some good old common sense.

Author: darienacosta
Content: Yes, really goes to show the type of turn the tech industry is taking. In order to continue to improve existing functions (email, searches, etc) more and more cutting edge analysis techniques must be developed.
